Instrucions for contributors

Source: vignettes/articles/Instrucions.Rmd
Instrucions.Rmd

Hi! Thanks for considering to contribute to StealLikeBayes!

This article will give you an idea of what’s ahead of you to contribute to the repository and package. Begin by forking the repo on GitHub and opening an issue about your contribution. Just, open an issue by clicking New issue >> A new submission template. This issue will contain the following instructions:

Instructions to follow 

Rcpp::compileAttributes()
devtools::document()
devtools::check()
